 ./vwrays.exe -fd greenbox.pic | rtrace -fda `vwrays -d greenbox.pic` -ovm 
testroom.oct  | grep "green_plastic" > rays.txt


I get (0.239, 0.443, 0.219) which are similar but not exactly the same values.
